verbs.description: Tom Steyer , [ARG0: the billionaire liberal donor] [V: spending] [ARG3: millions] [ARGM-PRP: to try to impeach President Donald Trump] , blasted his Democratic critics in a Politico podcast on May 29 . Steyer said many things in the Off Message political podcast hosted by Isaac Dovere — including comparing Democratic pushback against his impeachment efforts to opposition to the civil rights movement , said Rep.
